Reviews.Title: Easy setup, works with android and iOS
Reviews.Author: TJwu
Reviews.Content: It is an ok camera, solves the purpose of monitoring the doorway. I have it outside under the roof.It Works when it is pointed outside towards a sunny area, so I can monitor who came to my house.The night vision is just good, and gets the face clearlyThe iphone app helps a lot, which allows me to monitor from somewhere else also. Also works with the Google Nexus of my wife.It is very easy to configure.There is audio, bit noisy, since it does not filter off the background noises, but better than nothing. I can hear cars whiz by, but very little wind noise.That's all, since I have not played it much. I might be back if I find something new.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Sunderll
Reviews.Content: As usual I read the other reviews and some were disturbing. However, since this camera was precisely what I was looking for and a really good price and I was forwarded. I decided to give it a try. I't been up and running for two days now. It really was easy to set up and once I learned what command did what have had 100% satisfaction. I tried the Icloud with warning emails and text messages. It has worked flawlessly. At 3 AM, I heard my Iphone chime indicating both an email and text message. I was able to instantly view the intruder(my 6 pound cat)save the video(or still image if you prefer) of her eating food and email the video to my work email. I did the same thing at work. Mid morning the cat entered the room, I received a TM and email. I viewed the "event" saved the video and emailed it to my home email. All without a hitch. I live in a rural setting and leave my house empty often for business trips. Altohugh I have an alarm system and outside cameras, I always felt vulnerable. NOw, I really feel a lot better about my empty house being more secure.NOTE, so far the 3G system my Iphone has isn'tvery reliable with this system. So, for the results I mentioned, 4G or WIFI is the way to go. Don't expect too much with 3G.

Reviews.Title: difficult keeping it connected
Reviews.Author: Spylab
Reviews.Content: For the price this is OK but it was more problematic to set up and keep the connection going.  The picture was a little grainy, the camera was hard to point, and ultimately I returned the device.  I just tried another camera for the first time this week and it truly is simple and works well.  It is the dropcam and though more expensive, I think it is well worth the price difference for quality of the product and ease of use. I am referring to the regular dropcam that sells for $149 on Amazon

Reviews.Title: Has not worked
Reviews.Author: Katherine Price
Reviews.Content: Item has never worked.  It powers up but the program which its suppose to run on does not work.  So it sits in my window just blinking.

Reviews.Title: bought used
Reviews.Author: spirits3250
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 used cameras. All the parts were there. All three work.  The pnp is really simple. One of the cams is only black and white. ... no color. One flashes a light on and off when it's dark.  If I had bought these new I would have sent them back.  But for used at such a low  price they are sufficient for my needs. I don't like that the video times out after 30 minutes but these are secondary cams so for now they are Ok.  Seedonk works well but to have them record and notify they charge a fee. Loftek support is non existant.  I emailed them 5 or 6 times with questions....absolutely no response.  For this reason I will no longer buy loftek cameras. I will spend a bit more and get a cam with customer support.

Reviews.Title: rough start but gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Karin Cadario
Reviews.Content: I bought this camer so i can monitor my almost 3yr old son and infant daughter since they share a room.Getting it to work was difficult at first because i just couldn't get it to connect to the wireless but then somehow it did it on its own( i know lucky me , i was ready to return it)Then the next problem was getting nightvision to work,  the instructions doesn't tell you that you have to create and account and log in online and select that setting on the website.so that's how i got it to work.My next dilemma is i remember it saying in the description that it has 2way audio, well i do get to hear my son but i can't figure out how to make him hear me!other than that it does the job and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: loftek
Reviews.Author: dr
Reviews.Content: great easy to setup & use directly from your Android or i phone simply download the app, plug in camera & connect, low cost without lowering the quality.

Reviews.Title: Simple
Reviews.Author: Harlan R. Haines
Reviews.Content: Simple set up and simple to get on.  Love it.  Using it as a monitor for our front porch.  My wife feels more secure.

Reviews.Title: Only able to view after upload to cloud server
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these and was very disappointed to find out that you cannot view the images without going through the seedonk cloud server.  All video streams have to be uploaded to seedonk server to view.  This has several negative connotations.  First it takes up bandwidth uploading and the more cameras you use the more it will have to upload.  Second as a security camera apparently you have to buy a subscription for security recording.  Third since all video is uploaded to Seedonk do you really want this as an interior camera that has your daily activities monitored and uploaded to a server you know nothing about?  Fourth, what happens if Seedonk is no longer there or in business?  Fifth, if your internet service goes down so does your security?Exterior quality seemed OK, if you are just looking for a camera to view with your cell phone away from home maybe this works, but it should not be used for or listed under security cameras.  I had to return mine for the above reasons.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied parent
Reviews.Author: PaReNt
Reviews.Content: cannot set up this camera to network. I keep getting a server error: Ldap server error.The camera at times doesn't even want to find connection options either wirelessly or when it is directly wired and when it does, I keep getting the same error message. I have spent over an hour on something that should, in theory, be very simple. I've tried to reset the camera several times and still no success. I have also tried creating an account on the website and circumventing the Itouch's registration, but still it will not register my camera on the network. Was really excited, but now I'm returning it.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't set it up
Reviews.Author: S. N. Rhodes "Certified More Awesome"
Reviews.Content: The camera refused to maintain a wi-if connection. I couldn't even set it up because it kept dropping the connection. I have no idea how well it might work using LAN as this would not serve my needs. I am not happy as my wife and I need this camera to help monitor our toddler who has taken to leaving his bed at night and I had hoped his would work for us. On to the next product...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Fender Fan
Reviews.Content: We got this so my wife could keep and eye on her elderly mother she was caring for in our home.Easy set up, nice range, easy to view on her Smart Phone

Reviews.Title: Camera Works Fine, But
Reviews.Author: Bob Hillenbrand
Reviews.Content: I gave it to a friend after working with it for weeks only to find that it will not work with my iPad.  I truly think that was promised in the ad, but could be my fault since I couldn't find the original post.
